review: I just bought this a couple days ago got it the next day with prime. We have issues with our internet and it has no problem streaming. Just like we were watching cable actually probably better. Love that having Prime we get a lot of movies and tv show to stream for free as well as music it means less money I have to pay it that is excellent for me.Installing: I got it connected to my TV in a matter of minutes started it up and the updating only took a couple minutes and it was good to go just like that.I would highly recommend this to anyone.There is one thing I would suggest. Either it is there and I just havent discovered it yet or its not capable of doing it. I would like to be able to search for shows rater than just browsing. Note I only got this a couple days ago still figuring out all the things it can do.
